metadata.name: the shell story
metadata.description:
The picture tells the story of eternity and love, which
is at odds with this eternity.
Shells, protecting their carriers, remain after their
death as a reminder of the transience of life. At the
same time, shells, as an image of eternal existence,
remind of themselves on everything that remains in
the water for a long time - they change the shape of
everything that becomes theirs due to time. Stones
in the water near the coast, forgotten ships or my
lyrical heroes.
And in this cold eternity, it gives us hope that it's all
not in vain, only love.
